CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 10 reads: "American Bridge Tournament Closes In Pittsburgh - Closing Saturday night in Pittsburgh was one of the most successful of all ABA gatherings, which drew some 500 bridge players to Pennsylvania to spend a week vying for honors... - All photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group of men, one wearing dark suspenders, and women, seated around small square table playing bridge, in Kay Boys Club with paper streamer decorations hung from ceiling, for the Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American  Bridge Association
